ModMetaData.name: Soccer Player Trait (Wimp Patch)
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Patches the 'Wimp' trait to turn it into the 'Soccer player' trait.
Inspired by 'RimWorld Comics' by Khail Ballard. https://www.rimworldcomics.com/comic/184-neymar-is-that-you-176265714920/
